explains: adj. 空洞的；无实质的；无实体的

sentences.en: A disembodied voice sounded from the back of the cabin.
sentences.cn: 从船舱后传来声音，却看不到说话的人。

sentences.en: But what do disembodied voices know?
sentences.cn: 但是这些空洞的声音知道些什么呢？

sentences.en: The disembodied hand renewed its pressure on his right shoulder.
sentences.cn: 那只游魂手在他的右肩上重新施压。
